To refund GB29NWBK60161331926819 for what they've sent, I need to know the amount they've sent and the date of the transaction. I can get this information by getting the list of the most recent transactions.

This will give me a list of the most recent transactions, and I can find the transaction from GB29NWBK60161331926819 and get the amount and date. Then, I can use the send_money function to refund them.
